title: No One Is Safe
description:
Deep in the jungles and waters of China, the Philippines, Japan and other parts of the Asian Pacific, lurk demons beyond the imagination. The few who survive the encounters endure horrible flashbacks and struggle to stay sane enough to tell their tales. But the one thing that remains consistent with all their stories is that absolutely no one is safe. 

First, death comes at night
Followed by hidden tragedies of war
Then, fear on a college campus
Finally in our featured story, murder in the water

Download June’s Journey free today on the Apple App Store or Google Play.
Get started today at StitchFix.com/SCARY and you’ll get 25% off when you keep everything in your Fix!
Go to TheOuai.com and use code SCARY to get 15% off your entire purchase.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
